item.title: Enverus公司称，油价疲软、页岩耕地面积有限将影响2025年的能源并购
item.description: 分析公司 Enverus 周三表示，随着油价下滑和优质耕地减少，美国上游油气勘探开发市场正准备迎接自 COVID-19 大流行以来最具挑战性的局面，尽管上一季度交易量跃升至 2018 年以来第二好的开局。【原文：The U.S. upstream oil and gas M&A market is bracing for the most challenging conditions since the COVID-19 pandemic as oil prices slump and prime acreage dries up, analytics firm Enverus said on Wednesday, even though dealmaking jumped last quarter to the second-best start to the year since 2018.】

item.title: 巴西 Voepass 航空公司申请破产，将财务困境归咎于 LATAM 航空公司
item.description: 根据法院文件，巴西私营航空公司 Voepass 于周二晚些时候申请破产保护，称总部设在智利的 LATAM 航空公司的行为是造成其财务危机的主要原因。【原文：Brazil's Voepass, a privately held airline, filed for bankruptcy protection late on Tuesday according to court documents, citing the actions of Chile-based LATAM Airlines as a major reason for its financial crisis.】

item.title: LTIMindtree 因医疗保健业务疲软，季度收入略低于预期
item.description: 印度第 6 大软件服务出口商 LTIMindtree 周三的季度收益略低于预期，原因是其医疗保健和消费部门的收入下降。【原文：India's No.6 software services exporter LTIMindtree on Wednesday marginally missed quarterly earnings estimates due to a revenue decline in its healthcare and consumer segments.】

item.title: 安费诺预测本季度电子工具需求增长强劲，股价大涨
item.description: 电子设备制造商安费诺（Amphenol）周三预测第二季度业绩将高于华尔街预期，押注于数据通信和国防市场需求的增长，使其股价在盘前交易中上涨了 12%。【原文：Electronics equipment maker Amphenol forecast second quarter results above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, betting on growing demand in data communications and defense markets, sending its shares up 12% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 美国联邦调查局称，针对美国基础设施的勒索软件攻击投诉上升 9
item.description: 美国联邦调查局（FBI）周三表示，勒索软件是2024年关键基础设施面临的最普遍的网络威胁，因为有关此类攻击的投诉比2023年猛增了9%。【原文：Ransomware was the most pervasive cyber threat to critical infrastructure in 2024 as complaints regarding such attacks jumped 9% over 2023, the FBI said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称关税压力将使全球公共债务超过流行病水平
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周三表示，随着经济增长放缓和贸易给政府预算带来压力，美国新关税带来的经济压力将使全球公共债务超过大流行病时期的水平，到本十年末，全球公共债务占全球国内生产总值（GDP）的比例将接近100%。【原文：Economic pressures from steep new U.S. tariffs will push global public debt above pandemic-era levels to nearly 100% of global GDP by the end of the decade as slower growth and trade strain government budgets, the International Monetary Fund said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 任天堂称无法满足日本 Switch 2 彩票需求
item.description: 任天堂周三表示，它已在日本收到 220 万份 Switch 2 游戏设备的抽签申请，但无法满足所有需求。【原文：Nintendo said on Wednesday it has received 2.2 million applications in the lottery for its Switch 2 gaming device in Japan but cannot fulfil all the demand.】

item.title: D 轮融资后，Chainguard 估值达 35 亿美元
item.description: 计算机和网络安全初创公司Chainguard在最近一次融资后获得了35亿美元的估值，在人工智能应用日益普及的背景下，网络安全公司继续获得投资者的青睐。【原文：Computer and network security startup Chainguard fetched a valuation of $3.5 billion following its latest fundraising, as network security firms continue to garner investor interest amid growing AI adoption.】

item.title: 法国媒体公司就商业行为起诉 Meta
item.description: 代表这些公司的律师事务所表示，包括 TF1、法国电视台和 BFM 电视台在内的法国媒体公司正在起诉 Facebook 所有者 Meta，称其商业行为不合法。【原文：French media companies, including TF1 , France TV and BFM TV, are suing Facebook owner Meta over what they say are unlawful business practices, law firms representing them said.】

item.title: Meta、苹果因违反欧盟反垄断规则被罚款 7 亿欧元
item.description: 欧盟监管机构周三对苹果公司和 Meta 公司处以总计 7 亿欧元（约合 8.77 亿美元）的罚款，原因是它们违反了新的反垄断规则，这是旨在遏制大型科技公司势力的里程碑式立法规定的首批制裁措施。【原文：European Union regulators on Wednesday imposed fines on Apple and Meta totalling 700 million euros ($877 million) for violating new antitrust rules, the first sanctions under landmark legislation aimed at curbing Big Tech's power.】

item.title: 联邦调查局称 2024 年网络犯罪成本至少增至 160 亿美元
item.description: 美国联邦调查局在本周三发布的一份报告中称，去年各种网络犯罪给全球受害者造成的损失超过 160 亿美元。【原文：Cybercrime of all stripes cost victims globally more than $16 billion dollars last year, the Federal Bureau of Investigation said in a report released on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道韦丹塔考虑在美国上市，为赞比亚铜矿资产融资 10 亿美元
item.description: 三位熟知详情的消息人士告诉路透社，韦丹塔资源公司（Vedanta Resources）正在考虑将其在赞比亚的康科拉铜矿公司（Konkola Copper Mines）在美国公开上市，作为其试图筹集约 10 亿美元用于矿山开发的选项之一。【原文：Vedanta Resources, is considering a U.S. public listing for its Zambian unit Konkola Copper Mines as one of its options to try to raise about $1 billion for mine development, three sources familiar with the details, told Reuters.】

item.title: 诺福克南方公司第一季度收入因冬季风暴和燃油附加费下降而下降
item.description: 美国铁路运营商诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）周三报告称，由于燃油附加费下降和冬季风暴的影响，该公司第一季度收入有所下降，并重申了全年业绩预期。【原文：U.S. railroad operator Norfolk Southern reported a fall in its first-quarter revenue on Wednesday, due to lower fuel surcharges and impact from winter storms, and reaffirmed its annual forecast.】

item.title: 万宝路制造商菲利普-莫里斯（Philip Morris）因 ZYN 业务强劲而上调年度利润预期
item.description: 菲利普莫里斯国际公司（Philip Morris International）周三上调了年度利润预期，提前实现了投资者对整个 2025 年前景上调的希望，这要归功于包括尼古丁袋品牌 ZYN 在内的新产品的表现。【原文：Philip Morris International hiked its annual profit forecast on Wednesday, delivering early on investor hopes for outlook raises throughout 2025, thanks to the performance of newer products, including the nicotine pouch brand ZYN.】

item.title: 欧盟 2 月份对美出口激增 22.4
item.description: 欧盟统计局（Eurostat）周三的数据显示，2月份欧盟对美国的出口同比增长22.4%，创下13个月以来的最高出口增长率，出口总额达518亿欧元。【原文：European Union exports to the United States increased by 22.4% in February compared to the previous year, Eurostat data showed on Wednesday, marking the highest exports growth rate in 13 months and totalling 51.8 billion euros.】

item.title: 通用电气弗诺瓦公司因电力和电气化业务强劲而实现季度收入增长
item.description: 通用电气弗诺瓦公司（GE Vernova）周三公布的第一季度营收超过华尔街预期，主要得益于其电力和电气化部门的强劲表现，该公司股价在盘前交易中上涨超过 8%。【原文：GE Vernova reported first-quarter revenue on Wednesday that beat Wall Street estimates on the back of strong performance at its power and electrification units, sending its shares up more than 8% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 由于费率上调和强劲的电力需求，NextEra 盈利超出预期
item.description: 受电力公司上调费率和电力需求增长的提振，NextEra Energy 公司周三公布的第一季度利润超出华尔街预期。【原文：NextEra Energy beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit on Wednesday, boosted by rate hikes at its electric utility and increased power demand.】

item.title: 波音公司因喷气机交付量增加而减少季度亏损
item.description: 波音公司周三公布的季度亏损小于预期，因为这家美国飞机制造商生产并交付了更多的喷气式飞机，而在此之前，一场质量危机和瘫痪性罢工导致其大部分飞机的生产在2024年底停产。【原文：Boeing reported a smaller-than-expected quarterly loss on Wednesday, as the U.S. planemaker produced and delivered more jets, after a quality crisis and crippling strike shuttered production of most of its aircraft in late 2024.】

item.title: 因国防产品需求持续增长，Teledyne 季度业绩居首
item.description: 受航空航天和国防领域对目标探测传感器和电子元件持续需求的推动，美国国防公司 Teledyne Technologies 周三公布的第一季度利润和收入均超出预期。【原文：U.S. defense firm Teledyne Technologies topped expectations for first-quarter profit and revenue on Wednesday, aided by sustained demand for its target detection sensors and electronic components used in aerospace and defense.】

item.title: 临床研究工具和服务需求稳定，赛默飞业绩超出预期
item.description: 赛默飞世尔科技公司（Thermo Fisher Scientific）周三公布的第一季度利润和收入均好于预期，这主要得益于市场对其用于开发疗法的产品和服务的强劲需求。【原文：Thermo Fisher Scientific reported better-than-expected profit and revenue for the first quarter on Wednesday, helped by resilient demand for its products and services used for developing therapies.】

item.title: TE Connectivity 因利润率提高，第二季度利润超出预期
item.description: TE Connectivity 周三公布的第二季度利润好于预期，并预测由于其工业解决方案部门的营业利润率提高，本季度的收入将有所增长。【原文：TE Connectivity reported better-than-expected profit in the second quarter on Wednesday and forecast upbeat revenue for the current quarter, on the back of improved operating margin at its industrial solutions unit.】

item.title: 通用动力公司利润因国防需求持续增长而上升
item.description: 通用动力公司（General Dynamics）周三公布第一季度利润增长 27%，主要得益于地缘政治不确定性下对军用弹药和车辆的持续需求，国防部门业绩强劲。【原文：General Dynamics reported a 27% rise in first-quarter profit on Wednesday, driven by strength in its defense units owing to sustained demand for military munitions and vehicles amid geopolitical uncertainties.】

item.title: 交易量创历史新高，CME 季度利润大幅增长
item.description: 周三，衍生品交易所 CME 集团公布第一季度利润增长近 12%，主要得益于各产品线创纪录的交易量，交易员们在瞬息万变的经济环境中游刃有余。【原文：Derivatives exchange CME Group posted a nearly 12% jump in its first-quarter profit on Wednesday, buoyed by record trading volumes across product lines as traders navigated a rapidly changing economic environment.】

item.title: 沙特航空公司确认订购 10 架空客 A330neo 喷射机
item.description: 沙特廉价航空公司 flyadeal 周三确认了一项订购 10 架空客 A330neo 宽体客机的协议，以拓展东南亚快速增长的长途市场。【原文：Saudi budget carrier flyadeal on Wednesday confirmed a deal to order 10 Airbus A330neo wide-body passenger jets as it expands into fast-growing long-haul markets in Southeast Asia.】

item.title: 瑞士莲暂缓加拿大供应转移，提振当地库存
item.description: 瑞士巧克力制造商瑞士莲（Lindt & Spruengli）表示，该公司仍在研究如何应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发起的不断升级的贸易战，并暂时增加了在加拿大的库存，以缓解关税带来的影响。【原文：Swiss chocolate maker Lindt & Spruengli said it is still working out how to deal with the escalating trade war launched by U.S. President Donald Trump and has temporarily increased stocks in Canada to cushion the impact of tariffs.】

item.title: 日本立法者敦促养老基金投资国内私募股权基金
item.description: 一群日本执政党议员周三呼吁日本顶级公共养老基金 GPIF 扩大对国内私募股权和风险投资基金的投资，以加强国内私人资产投资链。【原文：A group of Japan's ruling party lawmakers on Wednesday called on the country's top public pension fund GPIF to expand investment in domestic private equity and venture capital funds to strengthen the domestic private asset investment chain.】

item.title: 欧洲对科技监管保持强硬态度，谷歌和 X 成为下一个目标
item.description: 据三位直接知情人士透露，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌和埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 可能是下一个面临欧洲监管机构罚款的公司，因为尽管担心美国会征收报复性关税，欧洲监管机构仍会对大型科技公司采取强硬措施。【原文：Alphabet's Google and Elon Musk's X may be the next to face fines from European regulators, as they stay tough on Big Tech despite concerns of retaliatory U.S. tariffs, according to three sources with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: AT&T 依靠捆绑计划新增用户数超预期
item.description: 本周三，AT&T 第一季度无线新增用户数超出华尔街预期，主要原因是市场对其捆绑高速光纤服务和 5G 移动产品的计划需求稳定。【原文：AT&T beat Wall Street estimates for wireless subscriber additions in the first quarter on Wednesday, driven by steady demand for its plans that bundled high-speed fiber services and 5G mobile offerings.】

item.title: 人工智能繁荣受到关税和全球经济动荡的威胁
item.description: 美国企业的人工智能投资热潮摆脱了对回报缓慢的担忧，也摆脱了对中国 DeepSeek 廉价制造的人工智能模型的怀疑。但是，特朗普政府挑起的全球贸易战有可能阻碍从能源到软件等各行各业的繁荣。【原文：Corporate America's artificial intelligence investment frenzy has shrugged off fears of slow returns and doubts fueled by AI models built cheaply by China's DeepSeek. But a global trade war started by the Trump administration threatens to stall the boom across industries from energy to software.】

item.title: 美国 美好的一天？
item.description: 今天美国和全球市场的重要事件。金融市场》欧洲、中东和非洲地区编辑 Dhara Ranasinghe 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today. A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets by Dhara Ranasinghe, Editor, Financial Markets EMEA.】
